com.illcode.meterman.event

Interface EntityActionsProcessor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicWorldManager

    public interface EntityActionsProcessor
    An EntityActionsProcessor is notified when the list of entity actions to display is being generated. This allows listeners to add additional actions to the normal action list, to be handled by an accompanying GameActionListener.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void processEntityActions(Entity e, List<String> actions)
      Called when an entity's action list is being generated.

    • Method Detail

      • processEntityActions

        void processEntityActions(Entity e,
                        List<String> actions)
        Called when an entity's action list is being generated.
        Parameters:
        e - entity
        actions - the mutable list of actions that should be shown in the UI, It will be passed along to any other registered EntityActionsProcessorS before being displayed.
